info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Ravalli and west central Granite Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 400 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Darby to 12 miles northeast of Conner. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Woodside, Pinesdale, Grantsdale, Skalkaho Pass, Charlos Heights, Corvallis and Como. This includes Highway 93 S between mile markers 35 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
